hero.heading: Contact Clear Path
hero.text: Reach out to begin your journey to wellness

list.name: Veronica L.
list.text: Clearpath gave me the strength to overcome my anxiety. The compassionate therapists provided unwavering support, and I've found a renewed sense of purpose and tranquility in my life.

list.name: Pushpender Singh
list.text: Clearpath helped me regain control of my life. The personalized treatment plan and the caring staff made all the difference. I am now on a path to recovery and happiness.

contactHero.emergencyText: For mental health emergencies, please call 911 or visit your nearest emergency room.
